job.name: Kafka_Start_Or_Bind_Service
job.description: This workflow calls ProActive-Service-Automation service to deploy an instance of Apache Kafka publish/subscribe system (https://kafka.apache.org/). The deployed instance consists in a single publish/subscribe broker that is based on Apache Zookeeper coordination server. The name and the endpoint of the deployed instance are added to the list of variables.
